original_text: God comforted us not only because Titus came to us. He comforted us also by what Titus told us about you. He said that you had helped him to be strong. He told us that you want to see me. He told us that you are very sad about what happened. He told us also that you are ready to help me. Because of what Titus told us about you, I was very happy.
korean_text: 그가 온 것뿐 아니요 오직 그가 너희에게서 받은 그 위로로 위로하고 너희의 사모함과 애통함과 나를 위하여 열심 있는 것을 우리에게 보고함으로 나를 더욱 기쁘게 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: God comforted us not only because Titus came to us
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 디도가 우리에게 왔기 때문에 우리를 위로하셨습니다

sentences.original_text: He comforted us also by what Titus told us about you
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 또한 디도가 당신에 대해 우리에게 말한 것으로 우리를 위로하셨습니다

sentences.original_text: He said that you had helped him to be strong
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 당신이 그를 강하게 도왔다고 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: He told us that you want to see me
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 당신이 나를 보고 싶어한다고 우리에게 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: He told us that you are very sad about what happened
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 당신이 일어난 일에 대해 매우 슬퍼한다고 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: He told us also that you are ready to help me
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 당신이 나를 돕기를 준비되어 있다고 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: Because of what Titus told us about you, I was very happy
sentences.korean_translation: 디도가 당신에 대해 우리에게 말한 것 때문에, 나는 매우 기뻤습니다
